subject: Basketball
Atlantic Yards (Brooklyn)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The Knicks and the Nets both have grandiose plans to move to proposed arenas in the near future, but at the moment they are not going anywhere special.
snippet: The Knicks and the Nets both have grandiose plans to move to proposed arenas in the near future, but at the moment they are not going anywhere special.
